definition: Lanshan district of Linyi city 臨沂市|临沂市[Lin2 yi2 shi4], Shandong
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)

mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Characteristic of 060714 rainfall and floodwater is unfrequent in many rainfall and floodwater of the Helan Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 其特性在賀蘭山暴雨洪水中是歷次上少見的。

sentences.english: The characteristics of Helan Mountain flora of spermatophytes.
sentences.chinese: 賀蘭山種子植物區系的特徵。

sentences.english: After the tombs, you will see the cliff carvings at Helan Mountain and then be brought to Yinchuan.
sentences.chinese: 之後，觀賞賀蘭山上的峭壁雕刻，之後回銀川。

sentences.english: The northwest region refers to the vast tracts west of the Helan Mountains in China.
sentences.chinese: 西北地區是指賀蘭山以西的廣闊地域。

sentences.english: Helan Mountain, the young girl in the Haizhen miss her love.
sentences.chinese: 賀蘭山下，年輕的姑娘海真心中思念自己的愛人。
